TEXT.TITLE: WASTE MANAGEMENT <WMT> CANNOT ACCOUNT FOR DROP
TEXT.BODY: Waste Management Inc said in response to a Reuters inquiry that it knew of no reason to account for the decline in its stock, trading at 74-1/4, off 2-5/8. Reuter
